title: Dividend per share of Daimler AG 2006 to 2019
summary: Overall Dividend per share in euros has increased over the Year.
Dividend per share in euros is roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2018.
The line rapidly remained stable by 100.0% from Year 2008 to 2009, and lastly, increased by 18499999999900.0% from Year 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Dividend per share in euros, of value 3.65 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Dividend per share in euros about 0.0 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Dividend per share in euros has rose over the Year.
